mapper.select: select s.shop_name shopName,s.address address,tour.*, ACOS( COS(RADIANS(#{bo.latitude})) * COS(RADIANS(s.latitude)) * COS(RADIANS(s.longitude) - RADIANS(#{bo.longitude})) + SIN(RADIANS(#{bo.latitude})) * SIN(RADIANS(s.latitude)) ) * 6378 AS distance from t_shop_tour tour left join t_shop s on tour.shop_id = s.shop_id where tour.del_flag = '0' and tour.is_reserve = '0' ORDER BY sort asc,distance asc
